Text: Need help:::>   when i extract archive I have 4 files, how to join them???

Update: Put the 4 files 001 / 002 / 003 / 004 in the same Dir, and double-clic on *.001 or open in winrar a extract him. Install QuickTimeInstaller.exe and run. In tray icon, right click on quicktime logo and select About Quicktime and write name and serial from *.NFO file. Its simple.
